availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Montgomery County, Ohio, law student. Native of Bavaria. Son of Thomas Baumann and Constance Baumann. Law student in Montgomery County, Ohio, in 1860. Attorney in Montgomery County in 1862. Deputy Clerk for the Montgomery Court of Common Pleas in Montgomery County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Montgomery County, Dayton Ward 3, p. 201.
"His Good Deeds Live After Him," The Dayton Herald (Dayton, Ohio), July 8, 1903, p. 12.
KYR-0001-006-0077.
